nodes.bodyText: Optionally you could test if this array is isEmpty()

I'm thinking if we should override this class and add this method only in the inherited classs (i.e. MsalCppOAuth2TokenCache).
This way, we would be able to minimize exposing this to MSAL devs.
We can mark the original saveCredentials as protected.
Thanks for the suggestion Dome. Addressed
Should we explicitly list these three records in the params? (instead of passing it as an array).

@kreedula It occurs to me now that we ought to add some thread safety around this API -- if a few different threads start calling removeRefreshTokenIfNeeded() simultaneously we're going to have race conditions writing/reading from disk (saving new RTs while writing deleting old ones)
